backend/main.mo: Implements user profile storage and livestream management with access‑controlled updates and queries using Map and AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence for the livestream app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and theme variables for light and dark mode using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages in the AppLayout component.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout component with banner, logo, navigation, footer, and slot for content.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Internet Identity sign-in/out button handling authentication state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryNav.tsx: Renders main navigation buttons for YouTube, Facebook, Audio, Member, and Clover pages with active highlighting.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Authentication guard that shows a sign‑in prompt or loading state before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioMonitor.ts: React hook that lists audio input devices and manages starting, stopping, and adjusting volume for a live audio monitor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles login/logout flows, and initializes AuthClient with stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query for fetching and saving user profiles and livestream data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/clover/cloverConfig.ts: Loads and saves Clover configuration to localStorage with defaults for merchant integration.
frontend/src/lib/livestream/parseEmbedIn: Parses YouTube or Facebook embed inputs or URLs and returns a standardized responsive iframe snippet.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AudioInputPage.tsx: UI page that uses the audio monitor hook to select devices, start/stop monitoring, and adjust volume.
frontend/src/pages/CloverPlaceholderPage: Placeholder UI for Clover integration allowing local configuration of merchant settings with no active processing.
frontend/src/pages/MemberAreaPage.tsx: Member-only page that loads the caller's profile, allows initial profile setup, and supports editing and saving the display name.
frontend/src/pages/WatchLiveFacebookPage: Displays the Facebook livestream and lets authenticated users edit and save the embedded stream code.
Shows the YouTube livestream and enables authenticated users to edit and save the embed code.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, architecture notes, and image needs for the church app.
